structural_unit_name.en: Department of Special Education and Speech Therapy

name.en: Department of Special Education and Speech Therapy

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

title.en: Teaching Children with Special Needs in Kindergarten
Assessing Child Development in Special Education
Assessing Child Development in Special Education
Supervised Teaching Practice at Regular School

description.en: The students will apply the compulsory competencies of a special education teacher (level 7) in a preschool institution: detection and assessment of special needs of the child; planning and implementing the educational activities; creating a learning environment; counselling and collaboration in the special education area.
description.et: Üliõpilane rakendab koolieelses lasteasutuses erivajadustega laste arendamisel eripedagoogi 7. taseme kutse kohustuslikke kompetentse: õppija erivajaduste märkamine ja hindamine; õppetegevuse planeerimine ja õpetamine; õpikeskkonna kujundamine; eripedagoogiline nõustamine ja koostöö.

objectives.en: The aim of the traineeship is to apply the theoretical knowledge and skills connected to preschool children with special needs, and to be able to work as a special education teacher in kindergarten.
objectives.et: Rakendada teoreetilistel kursustel saadud teadmisi ja oskusi seoses koolieelses eas erivajadustega lastega, tegutseda eripedagoogina koolieelses lasteasutuses.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. The student is able to assess transferable skills and speech development of preschool children with special needs and fill in specific documents about their development.
learning_outcomes.et: 1.	Üliõpilane oskab hinnata erivajadustega lapse üldoskuste ja kõne arengutaset ning koostada lapse eripedagoogilist iseloomustust.

learning_outcomes.en: 2. The student is able to analyse, plan and implement educational activities for preschool children with special needs and to make activity planning for special education teacher.
learning_outcomes.et: 2.	Üliõpilane oskab analüüsida, planeerida ja läbi viia erivajadustega lastele sobivat õppetegevust, koostada eripedagoogi tööplaani.

learning_outcomes.en: 3. The student is able to assess the suitability of the learning environment for children with special needs and to analyse actions of adult for teaching behaviour.
learning_outcomes.et: 3.	Üliõpilane suudab hinnata õpikeskkonna sobivust erivajadustega lastele ja oskab analüüsida täiskasvanu tegevust laste käitumise kujundamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: 4. The student appreciates cooperation with class teachers and parents and knows how to develop it further; is able to analyse his/her competencies and developmental needs for working as a special education teacher in kindergarten and plans his/her professional career accordingly.
learning_outcomes.et: 4.	Üliõpilane väärtustab ja oskab arendada koostööd õpetajate ning lapsevanematega, suudab analüüsida iseenda kompetentsust ja arenguvajadusi lasteaias eripedagoogina töötamiseks ning planeerib oma erialast karjääri sellele tuginedes.

learning_outcomes.en: 5. The student will analyse helping relationships and develop his/her ability to recognise and describe ethically complex situations.
learning_outcomes.et: 5. Üliõpilane analüüsib aitamissuhteid ning arendab oma oskust märgata ja kirjeldada eetiliselt keerulisi olukordi.
